attributes.action: Vet and double check MP's for unprofessional behaviopur and dangerous anti social character defaults
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Checking all MP's thoroughly and vetted more stringently for character and behaviour defects before being allowed to represent the public on any matter. And that they be regularly
checked  for such mal-behaviorals  on a regular basis as there seems to be a great lack of respect and distrust of them in our society at present due to their lack of accountability and onerous behaviours.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
